https://tmrev.io/movie/270885-Beyond Right & Wrong: Stories of Justice and Forgiveness 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yGELSW9b9G1vogKIpWDnxQGbRqT.jpg A survivor of the Rwandan Genocide struggles to forgive the man who killed her children. A victim’s daughter strikes up an unusual friendship with the ex-IRA bomber who killed her father. And two men—one Israeli, one Palestinian—form a bond after tragedies claim their daughters. Beyond Right & Wrong: Stories of Justice and Forgiveness
